00030 class CrgUnit;

00041 class CrgUnitType{
00042 public:
00043     
00046     
00047     ~CrgUnitType();
00048        
00049     const vector <unsigned int>& GetTransOrbs() const;
00050     
00051     const unsigned int & getId() const { return _id; }
00052     
00053     string & GetMolName();   
00054     
00055     const string & GetName() const { return _name; }
00056     
00057     // TODO: mol_and_orb should not be in the interface!
00058     mol_and_orb & GetCrgUnit();
00059     // TODO: orb should not be in the interface!
00060     const orb & GetOrb() const;
00061     // 
00062     basis_set & GetBS(){
00063         return _bs;
00064     }
00065 
00066     Property *getOptions() { return _options; }
00067     void setOptions(Property *options) { _options = options; }
00068 
00069 private:
00070     basis_set         _bs;
00071     mol_and_orb       _intcoords;
00072     orb               _orbitals; 
00073 
00074     Property *_options;
00075     
00076     vector <unsigned int> _transorbs;
00077     unsigned int      _id;
00079     string            _name;  
00080     // a list of atoms in the same bead of which atoms correspond to which bead
00081     vector < vector <int>  > _list_atoms_monomer;
00082     // a list of centre of mass of the monomer
00083     vector < vec  >   _list_coms_monomer;
00084     // a list of rotation matrices to put the internal coordinates of each monomer onto the reference state
00085     vector < matrix > _list_ors_monomer;
00086 
00090     void rotate_each_bead(
00091             vector < vec >::iterator it_pos , vector < vec >::iterator it_norm,
00092             vector <vec >::iterator it_plan, mol_and_orb * rotated_molecule );
00093 
00094     // can only be created by JCalc
00095     CrgUnitType(): _id(-1) {};
00096     
00097     // can only be created by JCalc
00098     CrgUnitType(
00099             const char * namecoord, const char * nameorb, const char * nameneutr,
00100             const char * namecrg, string & basisset, 
00101             const vector < int>& transorbs,
00102             const unsigned int &id,  string name,
00103             vector < vector < int > > list_atoms_monomer,
00104             vector < vector < double > > list_weights_monomer);
00105 
00106     friend class CrgUnit;
00107     friend class JCalc;
00108 };
00109 
00110 inline const vector <unsigned int>& CrgUnitType::GetTransOrbs() const{
00111     return _transorbs;
00112 }
00113 
00114 
00115 
00116 inline mol_and_orb & CrgUnitType::GetCrgUnit() {
00117     return _intcoords;
00118 }
00119

00121     return _orbitals;
00122 }
